page.title: 07WALBY HALL FARM FESTIVAL
page.content: The farm is famous for it's herd of prize winning pedigree Freisan cattle.At present there 180 of these.Although mainly a dairy farm,part of the 640 acres suppports 2500 sheep. However the Pattinson's farm is unique because every 4 years they hold a Farm Festival when farmers & cattle buyers come from all over the world to buy cattle from this herd and others nearby.At the same time farmers actually exchange cattle to strengthen their herds and improving the breeding stock. Walby hall is named after the Roman Wall which crossed the fields only a few metres away from the farm buildings themselves.A concrete track runs for about 1/2 km. along the old vallum.
